General.Name: Suzhou Everbright Photonics Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Suzhou Everbright Photonics Co., Ltd. researches and develops, designs, produces, and sells semiconductor laser chips in China and internationally. It offers high-power single-tube series products, high-power bar series products, high-efficiency VCSEL series products, optical communication chip series products, and other products. The company also provides diode laser chips, laser devices, fire coupled modules, stacks, and direct diode lasers. Its products are used in the industrial laser pumping, advanced laser manufacturing equipment, biomedical, high-speed optical communications, machine vision, and sensing applications. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Suzhou, the People's Republic of China.
